channel.title: Softlayer_billing_item_network_storage on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_billing_item_network_storage on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_Storage
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_Storage Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_Storage data type describes the billing items related to StorageLayer accounts. seeAlso SoftLayer_Billing_Item SoftLayer_Network_Storage Local allowCancellationFlag Flag to check if a billing item can be cancelled. 1 = yes. 0 = no. Type: integer associatedBillingItemId This is sometimes populated for orphan billing items that are not attached to servers. Billing items like secondary portable IP addresses fit into this category.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_Storage
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_Storage Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_Storage data type describes the billing items related to StorageLayer accounts. Local allowCancellationFlag Flag to check if a billing item can be cancelled. 1 = yes. 0 = no. Type: integer associatedBillingItemId This is sometimes populated for orphan billing items that are not attached to servers. Billing items like secondary portable IP addresses fit into this category. A user may set an association by calling [[SoftLayer_Billing_Item::setAssociationId]].
